title: Drawing, "The Last Supper", 1746–86
medium: Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Drawings of the side view of Jesus at the Last Supper.  He stands at center left in front of a table and surrounded by his disciples below a man from the rear bends over and pours a liquid out of a jug. Center right: a man walks out.  Above is a chandelier and drapery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Last Supper", 1746–86.
1746–86. Brush and wash, pen and ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-5667.
